featured.text: They emphasize the participants’ athletic achievements 27 their physical disability.

definition.zh_def: 運動的；體育的，擅長運動的
definition.en_def: Relating to athletes or sports; physically strong, fit, and active.
definition.example: She is very athletic and enjoys playing soccer every weekend.
